name: checkout-loyalty
description: Loyalty allows the user to pay for the order using loyalty points

className.description: Provide a custom css class name defined in the theme pack to target the CSS for this module

loyaltyHeadingText.comment: Text used for the loyalty section header of payment

payWithLoyaltyText.comment: Text for pay with loyalty dialog and header

payWithLoyaltyAmountLabel.comment: Label for input where user enters in amount to pay with loyalty program

selectLoyaltyProgramLabel.comment: Label paired with dropdown to select a loyalty program

totalLoyaltyDollarAmountText.comment: The text to display to the user to show their loyalty points in total dollar amount

availablePointsLabel.comment: Label to show total avaiable points

expiringLoyaltyPointsLabel.comment: Label to show expiring loyalty points

loyaltyCoveredAmountText.comment: Text to display next to dollar amount covered by applied loyalty points

applyCheckoutLoyaltyPaymentText.comment: Text for button that applies the loyalty payment

removeCheckoutLoyaltyPaymentText.comment: Text for button that removes the loyalty payment set
